C I R C U L A R  
 
 
It has been brought to the notice of this Bureau that instructions regarding checking 
of cellular phones issued by this Bureau vide Circular No. 13/98 dated 11.6.1998 are not 
implemented by Airport Security Unit while conducting pre-embarkation security checks. It 
has also been reported that items like pen, items contained in leather pouches etc., which 
are  removed by the passengers and placed in trays before passing through DFMD, are 
not x-rayed/ checked thoroughly by security staff as per instructions issued vide Circular 
No. 23/2005 dated 11.7.2005. Since such  items can be used by perpetrators to commit an 
act of unlawful interference, it is requested that the security personnel responsible for pre-
embarkation security checks may please be briefed/ advised to screen and check such 
items thoroughly, as per instructions in force. 
 
 
(R.D. Gupta) 
Officer on Special Duty (I)
